This is the list where the new reservations are stored. When you send a confirmation email, the reservation will be automatically moved to the Confirmed Reservations tab. You can also use the Print, Archive and Delete buttons associated with each reservation. If you have moved a reservation to this tab, but cannot see it, click here to load the list manually.
There are no reservations in New Reservations tab. If you have moved a reservation to this tab, but cannot see it, click here to load the list manually.

This is the list where the confirmed reaservations are stored. You can also use the Print, Move to New, Archive and Delete buttons associated with each reservation. If you have moved a reservation to this tab, but cannot see it, click here to load the list manually.
There are no reservations in Confirmed Reservations tab. If you have moved a reservation to this tab, but cannot see it, click here to load the list manually.

This is the list where you can keep an archive with past reservations. You can also use the Print, Move to New and Delete buttons associated with each reservation. If you have moved a reservation to this tab, but cannot see it, click here to load the list manually.
There are no reservations in Reservations Archive tab. If you have moved a reservation to this tab, but cannot see it, click here to load the list manually.

This is the list where the deleted reservations are stored. You can also use the Print, Move to New and Archive buttons associated with each reservation. If you have moved a reservation to this tab, but cannot see it, click here to load the list manually. Click here to delete all reservations in this tab permanently.
There are no reservations in Deleted Reservations tab. If you have moved a reservation to this tab, but cannot see it, click here to load the list manually.
